title: So Warwick rework is next right?
body: So now that yorick is done Warick is next in line correct? Ive been waiting for the ww rework for so long, since they announced it in 2014. Would be great to see him get more utility in his kit an a visual over haul

replies.body:
Warwick's the next full update, as BananaSlayerAMO below mentions though the assassin class update will be out beforehand. 

In terms of the update there are some similarities to the proposed kit posted back in 2014 (they're both starting from existing Warwick after all). It's a different team working on the update though with the game in a different state, so it's not exactly the same direction.

With WW and Kog getting changed might you get the Item's team to look at Wit's end again?

They are still the only 2 who have been frequent buyers because they are the only 2 who easily apply full MR reduction stacks.

I miss it being something that Irelia valued buying in season 2.
Kayle buys it a lot, teemo can rush it vs ap top laners, and you'd be surprised how good it is on shen and sometimes mord when you are splitpushing.

They buy it in less then 10% of games.

It is not a good item even for champs who might make good use of it in theory.

Kog and WW could make good use of it because they could easily and quickly apply full NR shred stacks.

Oh wow, I haven't realized until now that you guys take the current state of the game in consideration when reworking a champ O.o isn't that a bit counterproductive though? I mean, if the game changes and then the champion falls out of flavor you'd need to pour some more work on it eventually :S
It's less current state of the meta and more where the game's up to overall (e.g. rewards from objectives have changed a bit over time, as have itemization, jungle camps etc).
Do you guys still think it will be possible to release him before this year ends?
Probably at earliest will be December
Will u give abandon Aatrox till the rework next year (if its Divers) ?
I thought the assassin's update already went live with 6.22...
